## ExtendedStylesInjectOptions.script property

The way how the styles injector script will be referred from the generated source. Options: - `embed`<!-- -->: embedding loader script in the target source - `eject`<!-- -->: the loader script will be ejected to the provided scriptEjectPath - `import`<!-- -->: the loader script will be referred by the import statement

Default: 'import'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
script?: 'embed' | 'eject' | 'import';
```
